attributes.additional_details:
In-line with Germany, France, Italy, Spain and other countries I believe the UK should ban HGV movements at weekend. We should implement the same restrictions as Germany. Their economy seems not to suffer so I would expect the UK to be the same.
http://www.ajdor.co.uk/secondary/EUROPEAN%20HGV%20RESTRICTIONS.htm
There would be exceptions to the weekend ban such as perishable goods for urgent delivery.
